profile_positions.title: Fintech - Financial Systems Architecture - Director Senior Solutions

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for end-to-end software and hardware technology lifecycle for all Shimano Europe, with main focus on core ERP JDE capabilities, Business Intelligence, Integration Services, End user collaboration tools, Cloud and infra services offerings and new technologies to drive business value across Europe.
• Establish the IT governance, architecture and capabilities to support SAP “One Team Shimano” global Transformation program, taking ownership of technical and architectural analysis in all layers of IT & business organizations
• Accountable for all Application & Infra staffing & resourcing plan, organization, onboarding and delivery of Support services, ensuring SLAs are met, Incident, Problem and Service mngt disciplines are performed at highest standards
• Ensure Shimano Europe IT standards and policies are established & followed across the projects & support, with all commitments delivered on time, on budget and with high quality
Main Projects:
• SAP ‘One Team Shimano’ program, shaping the need from 18 different countries in Europe for both Bike and Fishing divisions, global solution alignment and creation of fundamentals for the program along with Shimano Corporate, in Japan

Environment 	: JDE, SAP BTP, Azure, JIRA, Confluence, Oracle, PowerBI, Infrastructure, Cloud Services
profile_positions.title: Head Of Information Technology

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for developing and delivering core ERP and Planning capability offerings and new technologies to drive business value across LATAM. Accountable for the ERP and Plan products across all segments in the region working closely with the global PL leaders and the regional BTLs to ensure maximum leverage and value for this high growth & developing region

• Responsible for accomplishing tangible bottom line results for the IT delivery of SAP ‘Back-to-Basics’ LATAM deployment, applying Agile & Scale Agile (SAFe) frameworks as well as Lean Six Sigma techniques in pursuit of continuous improvement

• Lead technology-wise foundational discussions & definitions, taking accountability to drive IT as an enabler throughout the SAP ‘Back-to-Basics’ LATAM implementation to harmonize, transform a implement 100% of the key elements from the business case for the region vs requirements within project scope

• Establish the IT governance process to support SAP ‘Back-to-Basics’ LATAM IT leadership team, taking ownership of conflicts and acting as a problem-solver in all layers of IT & business organizations

• Accountable for all Application Services staffing & resourcing plan, organization, onboarding and delivery of ‘Back-to-Basics’ LATAM selected vendor, ensuring positive indirect & direct impacts on the program would be properly managed, escalated and concerns elevated to the appropriated organizations

• Identify and prioritize continuous improvement opportunities and initiatives through the analysis and evaluation of performance data from business streams

Environment: SAP, Oracle Instantis/Primavera, Agilie/SCRUM/SAFe, JIRA, HP ALM, Lean Six Sigma.
profile_positions.title: IT Application Services Director / Plan & ERP Product Line Owner

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for accomplishing tangible bottom line results for the IT delivery of Back-to-Basics Latin America deployment (BtB NR/SR project), applying Agile & Scale Agile (SAFe) frameworks as well as Lean Six Sigma techniques in pursuit of continuous improvement

• Maintain the overall view of current process improvement efforts and facilitates those on a continuing basis, predominately enhancing processes as well as project and product quality results

• Identify and prioritize continuous improvement opportunities and initiatives through the analysis and evaluation of performance data from business streams

• Design, integrate and execute Requirements & Testing strategies as key disciplines for software solutions delivered by IT AS BtB NR/SR team

• Establish, define, implement and monitor structured measurement foundation/framework for quality assurance in terms of Application Development & Support work in LA

Environment: SAP, Oracle Instantis/Primavera, Agilie/SCRUM/SAFe, JIRA, HP ALM, Lean Six Sigma.
profile_positions.title: IT Application Services Senior Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Maintain the overall view of current process improvement efforts and facilitates those on a continuing basis, predominately enhancing processes as well as project and product quality results

• Identify and prioritize continuous improvement opportunities and initiatives through the analysis and evaluation of performance data from business streams

• Responsible for the application of Lean Six Sigma techniques in pursuit of continuous improvement and for delivering tangible bottom line results

• Leverage Lean Six Sigma methodologies to document and measure operational processes, extract and analyze process data and develop strategies to deliver sustainable and breakthrough improvements to key business processes

• Design, integrate and execute Requirements & Testing strategies as key disciplines for software solutions delivered by IT AS LATAM team

• Establish, define, implement and monitor structured measurement foundation/framework for quality assurance in terms of Application Development & Support work in LA

Environment: SAP, Clarity, MS-Project Server, HPQC, CaseComplete, Lean Six Sigma.
profile_positions.title: IT Senior Manager Engineering Processes & Continuous Improvements

profile_positions.description:
• Lead technology-wise foundational discussions & definitions in IT LATAM, taking accountability to drive IT as a enabler throughout the SAP ‘Back-to-Basics’ LATAM implementation to harmonize, transform a implement100% of the key elements from the business case for the region vs requirements within project scope

• Establish the IT governance process to support SAP ‘Back-to-Basics’ LATAM IT leadership team, taking ownership of conflicts and acting as a problem-solver in all layers of IT organization

• Accountable for all Application Services staffing & resourcing plan, organization, onboarding and delivery of ‘Back-to-Basics’ LATAM selected vendor, ensuring positive indirect & direct impacts on the program will be properly managed, escalated and concerns elevated to the appropriated organizations

• Comprehensive IT Site Readiness management for SAP ‘Back-to-Basics’ LATAM implementation, with focus on Supply Chain & Manufacturing infra-structure of about +100 site locations in 13 different Latin America countries

• Conduct SAP ‘Back-to-Basics’ LATAM project cadence sessions for the IT community, involving and cascading info, definitions & decisions about the program rollout to empower them to take required actions in their specific domains. Monitor and control project deliverables database, providing oversight of all project products and activate escalation path through the definition of process triggers (such as Plan x Actual delivery dates not achieved)

Environment: SAP, ABAP, SharePoint, MS-Project Plan.
profile_positions.title: IT Senior Portfolio Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Key member of Digital Service Management organization, working with +300 external partners to ensure operational consistency of web & mobile operations, in terms of efficiency of support processes, customer satisfaction, incidents/problem resolution, small enhancements development, content changes and platform/technology optimization

• Facilitator of customer resolution for escalated problems and engagement of the necessary tech support. Build and develop strong relationships with both operational & business areas to increase support SLA's, including negotiation and closure of services contracts (SOW's)

• Work and follow up with +400 internal customers (from NA, LA & EMEA regions) to ensure issues are resolved within budget, time, scope, high quality & compliant to J&J standards

• Report operational achievements and progress to Directors/VP levels on a regular basis including statistical analysis and improvement of actions plans for a portfolio size of +1,200 applications from NA, LA & EMEA regions

• Excellent analytical and problem solving skills, combined with ability to provide quick resolution to problems, demonstrated leadership abilities through the delivered of +10MM USD of support services via virtual tech teams across the globe

• Constantly improving productivity by highlighting deficiencies and recommending tools, new processes and employee engagement. Delivered and exceeded on all team performance targets consistently throughout the years

• Continuous motivation a team of about 15 direct reports (J&J leaders) through performance coaching, career planning and setting professional goals

Environment: SharePoint, Drupal, Java, .NET, MySQL, Oracle, Clarity, iOS, Android.

Awards:
• ‘Leadership Encore Award' for continuous leadership skills displayed in App Services
• ‘Platinum Encore Award' for all services executed during 2008 for Global Services
• ‘Gold Encore Award' for continuous improvements in Global Services-Web Operations
profile_positions.title: IT Web Support Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Manage all J&J resources required to the project, assigning roles & responsibilities, managing changes to scope as well as identifying, documenting and communicating risks and issues to all stakeholders, when appropriated

• Ensure all project activities are delivered on schedule and within the estimate. Continuously monitor variances, providing additional explanation of deviances, when applicable

• Ensure J&J standards are followed across the projects and all documentation is completed correctly, with all requested information delivered on time. Experience with both Agile & Waterfall methodologies.

• Conduct team status meeting, reviewing status of the project and determine any new courses of action that may be required

• Large experience in international projects, including selected projects for SCAMPI A, B and C to achieve CMMI-Level 2

• Requirements gathering from business units from several locations around the globe (such as US, Japan, Mexico) to conduct vendor negotiation and define future scope for the SOW

Main Projects:
• Cockpit System (Set of Reports and Cubes to Monitor Supported Apps & Projects)

• SharePoint RMQ portal (Raw Material Questionnaire for J&J Consumer R&D)

• Support Transition of several apps from NA to LA team, such as Warehouse Management Systems; Corporate Financial Reporting Systems; EDI apps

• Accelerate Velocity Program (Application compatibility and remediation services, 	including Application Inventory, Rationalization, XP/Vista Compatibility Testing, Remediation, Packing & Scripting and Certification)

• Janssen Japan non-SAP applications (Set of 80 J&J Janssen Japan applications to be transitioned to Global Services. Responsible for understanding of current scenario, data collection from app owners, negotiation with vendors, SOW creation)

Awards:
• ‘Gold Encore Award' for Incident Parser System project   successful completion
• ‘Gold Encore Award for RMQ portal project successful completion
profile_positions.title: IT Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Define business, functional and system requirements with both technical and business groups

• Management and control of resources availability and financials

• Planning, tracking and reporting of application teams workload

• Collect, produce, manage and publish all documentation for CMMI-Level 3 compliance in the project repository

• Generate periodic reports for visibility of consolidated project information to service delivery managers and directors

• Management and control of all technical reviews and quality process validation for the projects

• Large experience in international projects, including selected projects for SCAMPI A and B reviews

• Management of all the phases of software life cycle such as scope, costs, time and issues of projects aligned to the corporative policies and standards

Main Clients: Sprint/Nextel Account and Itau Bank

Environment: WebSphere Portal, WebSphere EveryPlace, WebLogic, Java, C++, J2EE, JSP, EJB, .NET (ASP.Net, VB.Net, C# and ADO.NET), PL/I, Cobol Enterprise, Clarify Clear Basic Tool, MS Project Server, RPM and integration with Unix and Axis platforms (SOAP and Web Service standards)

Main Projects:
	• Balance Sync Across Touchpoints (Systems 	integration in order to provide consistent 	information across all the touchpoints)
	• Balance Sync Across Touchpoints - Phase II
	• RMS+ Direct Ship (System responsible for 	supporting the capability of ordering hot devices to 	be shipped direct to the customers)
	• RMS Direct Ship - Phase II
	• I&F Synergy - eTicket and SRS Integration 	(Integration between Sprint and Nextel systems 	used for repairing and servicing devices)
	• PL/I to Cobol Enterprise Mainframe Migration

Awards:
	• ‘IBM – Delivery Excellence Award – 	Dec/2006’ for successfully completing a critical 	project for Itau Bank as a project manager

	• ‘IBM – Service Excellence Award – 	Nov/2006’ for successfully and consistently 	performing the project manager role during 2006 	year

Main Projects:
• e-Customer Cadmus Product (help desk control)

Awards:
• ‘iBest in Appreciation of Stars System (for cable TV category)’ for successfully completing a critical project for DirecTV company as a project manager.

• ‘iBest in Appreciation of Sony Style System (for e-commerce category)’ for successfully completing a critical project for Sony Brazil company as a project manager.
